```{r}
# Manually make equate the entries in the upper triangle to the conjugate of those in the lower triangle of the matrix
.eigen_deltas <- function(P){
  eigenvalues <- data.frame(values = eigen(P)$values)
  N <- nrow(P)
  diffs <- rep(0,N*(N-1)/2)
  k <- 0 
  # Run over entry of the matrix
  for(i in 1:N){
    for(j in 1:N){
      # Restrict view to one of the triangles; (i < j): Lower Triangles
      if(i < j){
        k <- k + 1
        diffs[k] <- eigenvalues[i,] - eigenvalues[j,]
      } 
    }
  }
  diffs # Return Hermitian Matrix
}
```

```{r}
.find_deltas(P)
```
